criteria: Shares technology news updates, favorite blog posts and conference sessions with the team via Slack channels, edu meetings
Takes a part in edu meetings
Proactively shares knowledge internally e.g. during teamâ€™s meetings, writing TIL posts
Identifies areas where common templates, starter-kits, shared-libraries or approaches could deliver efficiencies and improve quality
Actively takes a part in edu meetings e.g. makes presentations, encourages everyone else to make ones, tries to make meetings every week
Breaks down delivery and knowledge silos in their squad

Builds simple tools or introduces existing tools to team for the benefit of whole team e.g. PM works out an innovative way to improve projectsâ€™ management or QA implements a tool that makes QAâ€™s equipment management easier
Contributes to development of open-sourced shared libraries, frameworks and resources
